alert.note: Alert for Gooding (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 6:30PM MDT until further notice by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Idaho, including the following county, Gooding. * WHEN...Until 930 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated between 1 and 2 inches of rain has fallen from thunderstorms. Additional rainfall is occurring This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gooding and Bliss. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
